    Dengue example

    Function reference

    All functions

    cleansing_sivigila_data()
    Clean SIVIGILA data
    clean_depto_codes()
    Clean department codes of the disease data
    clean_depto_disease_codes()
    Clean department codes of the disease data
    clean_disease_ages()
    Clean ages of the disease data
    clean_disease_dates()
    Clean dates of the disease data
    concatenate_values_token()
    Concatenate values with separator or token
    filter_disease()
    Filter disease
    format_dates_values()
    Format dates
    get_depto_codes()
    Get department codes
    get_depto_names()
    Get department names
    get_months_most_cases()
    Get months major cases
    get_most_cases()
    Get row with major cases
    get_name_file_path()
    Get name file path or URL
    get_path_data_disease_year()
    Get the download path for a disease by specific year
    get_special_population_cases()
    Get special population and cases
    group_age()
    Group by age and cases
    group_age_range_cases()
    Group by age range and cases
    group_age_sex()
    Group by ages, sex and cases
    group_columns_cases() group_columns_cases()
    Group by columns and cases
    group_dept()
    Group by department and cases
    group_epiweek_cases()
    Group By week and cases
    group_notification_date()
    Group by notification date and cases
    group_onset_symptoms()
    Group by symptom onset date and cases
    group_sex()
    Group by sex and cases
    group_sex_epiweek()
    Group by sex, epidemiological week and cases
    group_special_population()
    Group by special population and cases
    import_data_endemic_channel()
    Import data of a disease to build its endemic channel
    import_data_separator()
    Import data with a specific separator
    import_geo_codes()
    Import geographical data of Colombia
    import_linelist_disease_year()
    Import data of a disease by year from the SIVIGILA microdata source
    import_sivigila_summary_data()
    Import SIVIGILA summary data
    list_available_diseases_years()
    Import diseases and years available for download from the SIVIGILA microdata
    parse_age_to_years()
    Parse age to years
    plot_age()
    Plot cases distribution by age
    plot_age_sex()
    Plot cases distribution by age and sex
    plot_dept_map()
    Plot map by department
    plot_epiweek()
    Plot epidemiological weeks
    plot_notification_date()
    Plot cases distribution by notification date
    plot_onset_symptoms()
    Plot cases distribution by symptoms onset date
    plot_sex()
    Plot cases distribution by sex
    plot_sex_epiweek()
    Plot cases distribution by sex and epidemiological week
    plot_special_population()
    Plot cases distribution by special population
    plot_variable()
    Plot by variable(s) or column(s)
    remove_error_dates()
    Remove error dates
    remove_nin_values()
    Remove NIN (NA, Infinitive, NaN) values
